0.text: Innate: Ahri generates a stack of Essence Fragment whenever she kills a  minion or  monster. At 9 stacks, she consumes them to  heal herself for 35 − 95 (based on level) (+ 20% AP).
0.html: Innate: Ahri generates a stack of Essence Fragment whenever she kills a minion or monster. At 9 stacks, she consumes them to  heal herself for 35 − 95 (based on level) (+ 20% AP).
markedPassages: minion
monster
heal
heal

1.text: Additionally, whenever Ahri scores a champion  takedown within 3 seconds of damaging them, she consumes their essence to heal herself for 75 − 165 (based on level) (+ 30% AP).
1.html: Additionally, whenever Ahri scores a champion takedown within 3 seconds of damaging them, she consumes their essence to heal herself for 75 − 165 (based on level) (+ 30% AP).
markedPassages: takedown

0.text: Active: Ahri sends her orb in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit. At maximum range, the orb homes back to her to deal the same in  true damage to enemies hit.
0.html: Active: Ahri sends her orb in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit. At maximum range, the orb homes back to her to deal the same in  true damage to enemies hit.
markedPassages: true damage

1.text: Enemies can be hit only once per pass.
1.html: Enemies can be hit only once per pass.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Enemies can be hit only once per pass.

0.text: Active: Ahri gains  40% bonus movement speed that decays over 2 seconds and conjures three flames which orbit her clockwise for up to 2.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Ahri gains  40% bonus movement speed that decays over 2 seconds and conjures three flames which orbit her clockwise for up to 2.5 seconds.
markedPassages: 40% bonus movement speed

1.text: After 0.25 seconds, each flame targets a  visible enemy, or after 0.4 seconds targets the closest visible enemy in range, dealing magic damage. The damage is doubled against  minions below  20% maximum health.
1.html: After 0.25 seconds, each flame targets a visible enemy, or after 0.4 seconds targets the closest visible enemy in range, dealing magic damage. The damage is doubled against minions below  20% maximum health.
markedPassages: visible
minions
20% maximum health

2.text: Subsequent flames on a single target deal 30% damage.
2.html: Subsequent flames on a single target deal 30% damage.

3.text: Flames prioritize enemy champions hit by  Charm, then enemy  champions, then minions that would die to Fox-Fire's damage, and then the target of Ahri's last basic attack within 3 seconds.
3.html: Flames prioritize enemy champions hit by Charm, then enemy champions, then minions that would die to Fox-Fire's damage, and then the target of Ahri's last basic attack within 3 seconds.
markedPassages: Charm
champions

0.text: Active: Ahri blows forth a kiss in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit,  knocking them down and  charming and  slowing them by 65% for a duration.
0.html: Active: Ahri blows forth a kiss in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit, knocking them down and charming and slowing them by 65% for a duration.
markedPassages: knocking them down
charming
slowing

0.text: Active: Ahri  dashes to the target location and then fires essence bolts to up to 3 nearby  visible enemies, each dealing magic damage. Spirit Rush can be recast twice more within 15 seconds of the activation at no additional cost, with a 1 second static cooldown between casts. Consuming a champion's essence with  Essence Theft while Spirit Rush is active extends the recast duration by and up to 10 seconds, and grants an additional recast, storing up to 3 recasts at a time.
0.html:
Active: Ahri dashes to the target location and then fires essence bolts to up to 3 nearby visible enemies, each dealing magic damage.

Spirit Rush can be recast twice more within 15 seconds of the activation at no additional cost, with a 1 second static cooldown between casts. Consuming a champion's essence with Essence Theft while Spirit Rush is active extends the recast duration by and up to 10 seconds, and grants an additional recast, storing up to 3 recasts at a time.
markedPassages: dashes
visible
Essence Theft

1.text: Recast: Ahri mimics the first cast's effects.

2.text: Spirit Rush's recast duration will persist even after having used all recasts.  Fox-Fire can be cast during the dash. Spirit Rush will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
2.html: Spirit Rush's recast duration will persist even after having used all recasts. Fox-Fire can be cast during the dash. Spirit Rush will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
markedPassages: Fox-Fire
possibleConcerningAbilities: Spirit Rush's recast duration will persist even after having used all recasts.  Fox-Fire can be cast during the dash. Spirit Rush will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
